name: Tag Generator
author: Nikitian

sections.description:
This plugin may generate tags for all or selected posts by Yahoo API. Supported text language: Russian, English, Polish, Ukrainian, German, French, Belorussian, Spanish, Italian, Bulgarian, Czech, Turkish, Romanian, Serbian. For support not only english language, using translator.

Requirements

  • PHP 5+
  • Extentions: cURL, iconv, json (if not build-in)
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin to your blog.
  2. Activate it.
  3. Select language of your posts in Tools->Tag Generator->Prefences.
  4. Start tagging all posts or select custom post for generate tags.
sections.changelog:

  • Fix fatal error on some reasons
  • Add bit more info on Yahoo errors

0.1.3.6

  • Fix bug with languages except english and russian.

0.1.3.5

  • Fix bug on PHP 7

0.1.3.4

  • Fix deprecated Yahoo API-method

0.1.3.2

  • Added catching Yahoo’s response error

0.1.3.1

  • Custom Yandex API key
  • Some stability fixes

0.1.2.1

  • Stupid fix

0.1.2

  • Fix Yandex translate crash.

0.1.1

  • Add support for more languages.
  • Localize interface.
  • Public plugin.
  • Auto add tags – it custom property

0.1

  • Start idea. Support only Russian language for text.

short_description: Generates tags for posts, using Yahoo and Yandex API.
